data.text: @lapublichealth All you covidian maskers.  Why?  Don't you realize a mask does nothing, it's basically nothing but a religious rite?
@trekkerteach12 @lapublichealth More like the urgency of clownery.
@Guglar9 @lapublichealth And people will blame the blood clots on the vaccine
@lapublichealth 50-135 people have died everyday of the flu since 2010. 90+ people die everyday from auto collisions. You people act like death just started happening in March of 2020.
@Lilyfromtheval2 @lapublichealth 90 people die everyday in auto collisions. Maybe you should have been paying attention to other humans lives before 2020??

@GilbertGJr @RobbieHutton1 @lapublichealth You must think LA County is in some kind of bubble? Half the states have not even had mandates, and covid goes up and down just the same there as it does in states with them.
@huero222 @sheikhorb @lapublichealth What are you telling the 90 people that will die in auto accidents today? People die man, it's part of the journey of life.
@huero222 @AGoldsmithEsq @lapublichealth 90 people per day die of car accidents in the US. 100 people die per day of the flu. What are you going to do about that?
